projects.project_description: A web application for purchasing books online.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to register an account.
user_stories.description: Users should be able to create a new account with their email and password.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should receive a confirmation email after registration.
user_stories.out_of_scope: Third-party authentication methods (e.g., social media login) are out of scope for this version.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to log in to my account.
user_stories.description: Registered users should be able to log in with their credentials.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User should be redirected to the homepage after successful login.
user_stories.out_of_scope: Forgot password functionality is out of scope for this version.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to browse books by category.
user_stories.description: Users should be able to view a list of books categorized by genre or topic.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should see categories listed on the homepage.
user_stories.out_of_scope: Advanced search functionality is out of scope for this version.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to be able to view details of a specific book.
user_stories.description: Users should be able to see detailed information about a book, including its description, author, and price.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a book should display its details on a separate page.
user_stories.out_of_scope: User reviews and ratings are out of scope for this version.
